name: Double-Chocolate Bread Pudding
author: MOUSIREID
summary: The best chocolate bread pudding dessert! Easy to make and a people pleaser! Serve with whipped cream if you like, or ice cream - or both!
ingredients: 6 ounces day-old French bread, cut into 3/4-inch cubes
directions: Heat heavy cream, sugar, and milk in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes
Stir chopped chocolate into warm cream mixture using a wire whisk until smooth and chocolate has melted completely
Whisk eggs and vanilla extract into mixture gradually until well combined
Place French bread into the bottom of a shallow 8-inch square glass or ceramic baking dish
Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally
Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Remove pudding from the refrigerator, uncover, and sprinkle with chocolate chips
Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, until set, 40 to 45 minutes
Let cool 10 minutes before serving warm, or cover and refrigerate to serve cold later
